question:
[Timothy] is proud that his daughter is such a good student. Her name is [Judy]. [Leila] planned a trip to the zoo for her brother, [Martin]. They had a great time. [Kenneth] was out with his son [Charlie]. Later that day they went to see [Kenneth]'s father, [Timothy]. [Michele] was happy to babysit her niece, [Fay]. [Fay] was a great child. [Ethel] went shoe shopping with her sister [Judy]. [Michele] and her son [Charlie] went out to lunch together yesterday. [William] was filled with pride and joy to see his daughter [Fay] perform in her first ballet recital. [Ethel] was excited to visit her son, [Martin], at college.
Question: How is [Leila] related to [William]?
